description: Try our easy to follow Strawberry & Lemonade Scones recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Strawberry & Lemonade Scones Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cup self-raising flour, plus extra for dusting
1 punnet strawberries, plus extra to serve
whipped cream and jam, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Grease and line baking tray with baking paper.
Stir flour, cream, lemonade and vanilla in a bowl until just combined. Add strawberries and fold through.

Turn out onto a floured surface. Gently press out until 5.5cm thick. Use a 5.5cm plain cutter, dusted in extra flour, to cut into rounds. Place rounds on tray, so they are slightly touching. Bake for 20-22 minutes or until lightly golden.
Cool slightly on tray then halve and serve with whipped cream, jam and extra strawberries.
